about.desc: Full Stack Developer in training, with experience in React, Angular, Spring Boot, and SQL/NoSQL databases. Committed to continuous learning and creating efficient, innovative solutions.

projects.project1d: I contributed as an assistant in the development and maintenance of the educational platform for the Ombudsman's Office. I participated in improving features, fixing bugs, and creating new APIs for both backend and frontend.
projects.project2t: Informative Website – Lincoln Larrea Educational Unit
projects.project2d: I developed a modern, responsive institutional website with information for students and parents. It was built with React and Firebase for fast deployment and easy maintenance.
projects.project3d: Web application focused on study techniques and productivity, developed with React, TypeScript, and Vite. Includes responsive design, reusable components, and an optimized interface for students.

contact.desc: If you’d like to collaborate or just say hello, feel free to send me a message below!
